content:
Craft an item of type: quartz_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "light_blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 42, "index": 21}, {"type": "warped_nylium", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 30}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 32, "index": 40}]

thought: I have all the ingredients needed to craft quartz_bricks, so I need to move the quartz_blocks into the crafting table. I will place the first quartz_block in the top left corner of the crafting table (slot 1)
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: quartz_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "light_blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 42, "index": 21}, {"type": "warped_nylium", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 30}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 32, "index": 40}]
thought: I will place the second quartz_block to the right of the first one (slot 2).
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: quartz_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "light_blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 42, "index": 21}, {"type": "warped_nylium", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 30}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 34}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 32, "index": 40}]
thought: I will place the third quartz_block below the first one (slot 4).
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: quartz_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "light_blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 42, "index": 21}, {"type": "warped_nylium", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 30}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 32, "index": 40}]
thought: I will place the fourth quartz_block to the right of the third one (slot 5).
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: quartz_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "quartz_bricks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "quartz_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "light_blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 42, "index": 21}, {"type": "warped_nylium", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 32, "index": 30}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 32, "index": 40}]
thought: I have successfully crafted the quartz_bricks, so I will move them from the crafting slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
